resources.string: Tap on the top image to play startup and death sound
Tap on the top image to play startup sound
This machine does not have startup or death sound
Long press the top image to view the large image
Tap below to access more specifications
The current volume is too high. Do you want to proceed playing?\nSelect \"Confirm\" to turn this warning off temporarily.\nGo to preferences page to turn this function off.
Open the drawer to navigate inside the application. Open the menu to access more options and get help.
Press the back button again to exit MacIndex

Open Directly in EveryMac is enabled. MacIndex will open the EveryMac Page of the machine directly instead of the Specification Page. If you want to disable this function, please access the Preferences Page.
Sort by time again to ensure correct positions for machines not in the same category. Turn off can make the loading faster. This only affects Categories and Search Pages.
Sort by time or sort by the order of addition. Turn off can make the loading faster. This only affects Comments Page.
Open the EveryMac Page of the machine directly instead of the Specification Page. Will ask for specific configuration if the machine has more than one configurations.
This is effective for both Main Page and Search Page. Some functions will no longer be available as well.
Play startup and death sound alternatively in the Specification Page, or play the startup sound only.
Enable high volume warning when using headphones in the Specification Page.
Enable buttons to navigate between machines in the Specification Page.
Always override the navigation range to the belonged category.
Only pick random machines inside the current group instead of all categories.
Save Usage in the Main Page
Save the last selected viewing method and category filter.
Save Usage in the Search Page
Save the last used search keyword and filter.
Save Usage in the Comparison Page
Save the last selected machines and column.

Your saved preference file will be completely cleared, including your preferences and all usage records. After you confirm, MacIndex will quit. This is helpful for troubleshooting, but cannot be undone.
Old world Macintosh does not have a Model Identifier or EMC Numbers. Please use the Gestalt ID instead.
New world Macintosh does not have a Gestalt ID. Please use the Model Identifier instead.
This will take a while and will evaluate the performance of your device of using MacIndex.

Benchmark has completed. This depends on the database I/O and processor performance, reflects the performance of your device of using the current version of MacIndex. Lower is better. You can share this score in public and with the developer.

Benchmark has completed. Based on your phone\'s score, enabling enhanced sorting is not recommended. Turning it off will greatly improve your experience, please decide accordingly. You can enable it later at the preferences page.

Benchmark has completed. Based on your phone\'s score, enabling enhanced sorting is recommended. Turning it on can ensure the correct overall order and will not impact your experience, please decide accordingly. You can disable it later at the preferences page.
Benchmark was interrupted. Please do not leave MacIndex during the process.
Benchmark was interrupted before its completion.
Not Available (Could be edited in the menu)
The special character \'│\' is internally used by MacIndex and cannot be included in the comment
Your input is too long, the max limit for each machine is 500 characters
Access all existing comments in the Custom Comments Page.
More than one configurations were found for this machine. Please make a selection then confirm.
Due to sale region or special purpose, this machine is not available in EveryMac
Sorry, but this page is only available in Chinese. Do you still want to proceed?
MacIndex will quit. Please report the bug to the developer.
Benchmark in progress. Do not leave MacIndex. This will take a while, depends on your phone\'s performance. Please wait.
Benchmark was interrupted. Waiting for the thread to terminate safely. Please wait.
No comment has been saved yet. You can add a custom comment at any Specification Page.
No comment has been saved yet
Please select the custom comment(s) to delete. This cannot be undone.
All existing custom comments will be cleared. This cannot be undone. Do you want to proceed?
Please select the custom comment(s) to export and copy. Don\'t modify it, and use the import option to import your custom comments.
Please paste the string exported by MacIndex. Don\'t modify it, or it will cause error.
Clear all existing custom comments (This cannot be undone)
No folder has been created yet. You can create a new folder right now, or you can create it later at the Favourites Page.
No folder has been created yet
Please select the folder(s). Manage your favourites folders in the Favourites Page.
Please select the folder(s) to delete. This cannot be undone.
Please select the folder to rename.
The special character \'│\' is internally used by MacIndex and cannot be included in the folder name
Your input is too long, the max limit for each folder is 1 line and 30 characters
This name was already specified and cannot be reused
You can only create no more than 10 folders.
All folders will be deleted. This cannot be undone. Do you want to proceed?
Select the folder(s) to export and copy. Don\'t modify it, and use the import option to import your folders.
Please paste the string exported by MacIndex. Don\'t modify it, or it will cause error.
Clear all existing folders (This cannot be undone)
You need at least 2 machines in the comparison list to use the comparison functions. You can add a machine at any Specification Page.
You need at least 2 machines in the comparison list
The comparison list will be cleared. This cannot be undone. Do you want to proceed?
No machine has been added in the comparison list yet. You can add a machine at any Specification Page.
Please select the machine(s) to delete from the comparison list. This cannot be undone.
Open source software by paizhang, Victor Jiao, Mation Wang, 2019-2021.\n\nFinal Project of CS 125 Fall 2019 and CS 199 Spring 2020, at University of Illinois, Urbana-Champaign.
Rotate your device to change the orientation
